system.description:
You move through the world like a shadow—and not always a shadow with the same shape. You gain the following benefits:

  • You can spend an hour performing a special ritual to create @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.3k3o90tq7gclpuem]{Thieves' Tools} out of natural materials. These thieves' tools last for a number of uses equal to your proficiency bonus, after which point they are too degraded to be of use. Only you or another character with this feat can use these tools, and you can only have one set at a time.

  • You never poison yourself on a failed check with the poisoner’s kit.

  • Half your druid levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining the damage done by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack}. 

  • Half your rogue levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3jdfihvtbyhbv9ez]{Wild Shape} feature.

  • You never leave a trail when traveling through natural surroundings unless you deliberately choose to.
